TextLang.Text: Yes
No
Copying... Please wait.
Copy completed.
Do you want to cancel the copy operation?
Copy completed. Do you want to delete the existing content that is saved on the PS3™ system?
There is not enough free space on the hard disk. At least %1 more free space is needed.
Deleting... Please wait.
Delete completed.
Please wait...
An error has occurred.
The data is corrupted.
An error occurred during the copy operation.
There is no Memory Stick™ inserted.
There is not enough free space on the USB device.
The USB device is locked.
The USB device cannot be accessed.
The USB device cannot be read.
There is not enough free space on the hard disk.
The hard disk cannot be accessed.
You must sign in to PlayStation®Network.
The content is not available before the start date.
The content has expired and is no longer available.
This content cannot currently be used on this system. This content will be available for use after 24 hours have passed from the time it was used on another PS3™ system.
The connected PSP™ system is activated with a different account. If you perform this operation, the current activation will become invalid. Do you want to continue?
Activating... Please wait. It may take 1 minute or longer to activate this system.
This content cannot be downloaded again.
This content cannot be accessed on your account.
The connected PSP™ system is not activated. Go to [PlayStation®Network] > [Account Management] to activate the PSP™ system.
Installing... Do not turn off the system.
The maximum number of themes that can be installed has been reached. To install this theme, you must delete an existing theme.
The current date and time could not be obtained.
The connection to the server timed out.
Scanning... Please wait.
No installable package was found.
Installing... Please wait.
Install completed.
An error occurred during the install operation.
Moving... Please wait.
Do you want to cancel the move operation?
Move completed.
An error occurred during the move operation.
Copyright protection information is corrupted, and will be restored.
The update cannot be completed. Target software for the update is not installed.
Install completed. Do you want to start this software now?
You must perform a PSP™ system software update. Update data for the PSP™ system has been saved on this disc.
This software cannot be installed. The maximum number of accounts that can install this software has been reached.
You must sign in using the account of the person who owns this content.
Do you want to start this software?
This software cannot be started due to region restrictions.
This content is not available because of parental control restrictions.
The same version is already installed. Do you want to continue installing?
A later version is already installed. There is no need to install this version.
Features Revised in Version %1
Do you want to cancel the purchase?
Downloading... Please wait.
Do you want to cancel the download operation?
There is not enough free space. The download operation stopped.
The maximum number of content items that can be saved has been reached. The download operation stopped.
An error occurred during the download operation.
An error occurred during the save operation.
Connect the PSP™ system using a USB cable, and then select [USB Connection] under [Settings] on the PSP™ system.
An error occurred during communication with the server. This is a DNS error.
Activating... Please wait.
Installing... Please wait.
Install completed.
A connection to the server could not be established.
An error occurred during the install operation.
This PS3™ system could not be activated. %1 PS3™ systems are already activated for your account. To activate this system, you must deactivate another PS3™ system.
This PS3™ system cannot be activated. This content cannot be used. %1 PS3™ systems are already activated for your account. To activate this system, you must deactivate another PS3™ system.
The connected PSP™ system is activated with a different account.
If you deactivate, the certificate for this account will become invalid. Do you want to continue?
More than one PSP™ system is connected. Connect only one PSP™ system.
This PSP™ system could not be activated. %1 PSP™ systems have already been activated with your account. To activate this system you must deactivate another PSP™ system.
You must perform a PSP™ system software update. For information on update methods, refer to the instructions for the PSP™ system.
Activation completed.
Deactivation completed.
You must sign up for PlayStation®Network. Do you want to sign up now?
To use this feature, you must first download software. Do you want to download now?
This account has already been associated with a different user on this system. Use a different account to register.
Do you want to exit PlayStation®Store?
Extension completed.
The expire date for [%1] has been reached. To install this content on the PSP™ system, you must purchase [%1] in PlayStation®Store.
The install operation could not be completed. You can use [%1] on only one PSP™ system.
The expire date could not be extended. You can use [%1] on only one PSP™ system.
You can change your avatar in [Account Information] under [PlayStation®Network] > [Account Management].
Install completed. Do you want to change your avatar now?
Update completed.
Do you want to cancel?
A system software update is required. Go to [Settings] > [System Update] and perform the update.
Signed out.
The server may currently be down for maintenance or updating. Try again later.
